columns.title: Attire
columns.description:
Formal / summer formal
Dress to impress - and for the weather, since we'll be in a marquee and garden setting. We advise bringing a light jacket for the evening, and wearing shoes suitable for walking in the garden (i.e. maybe not stilettos!).

columns.title: Gifts
columns.description: Since we've already kitted out our flat, we’re avoiding a traditional gift list. However, if you’d really like to give us something, we would be very grateful of any contributions towards making our honeymoon special.
